ygData.subject: RE: Dwarven Cleri
ygData.msgSnippet: You may want to consider keeping the BS tunic over the Mithril Runed Tunic.    In my opnion it is better,  while the MRT has 1 more wisdom, it has 4 less agi
ygData.messageBody:
You may want to consider keeping the BS tunic over the Mithril Runed
Tunic. In my opnion it is better, while the MRT has 1 more wisdom, it
has 4 less agi and 3 less AC. Also, depending on what your base wisdom
is, you will probably be close to the max wisdom of 200 anyway, once you
get all of the other items you have on your list.
I have base wis of 115 and am currently at 197 wisdom (I use all items
you listed in your upgrade) In addition to a Guardian shield and paw of
opallo.


> Bloodstained Tunic ac 13, +4 agi/wis
> --> Mithril-Runed Tunic ac 10, +3 sta, +5 wis
> Mammoth Hide Cloak ac 7, +4 wis, +5 cold
> Gatorscale Leggings ac 7, +4 wis, +15 hp
>
>
> Drizben D'Vorn
> Defiled Priest of Innoruuk
> Propagator of Hate
>
>
> > From: "Aaron Mattingly" <kistoga123@...>
> >
> > I am a lvl 15 dwarven cleric. I have 147wis, but i still want more. How
> > much do Gatorscale Leggings go for? Also any +wis items that could be
> > listed
> > would be very helpful. Thx
> >
> > Drado
> > lvl 15 Cleric
> > of Brell Serillis
> >
> >
> >
